price: (3) Greatly hateful in the sight of Allāh is that you say what you do not do.
arabic: كَبُرَ مَقۡتًا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَن تَقُولُواْ مَا لَا تَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: kabura maqtan ʿinda al-lahi an taqūlū mā lā tafʿalūna
